name: nuget-extensions-vscode
description: An extension to help leverage the nuget-extensions CLI in your Code workspace.

Nuget Extensions.defaultPackagePaths.description: When registering packages as link targets, packages in these paths will be used.

Nuget Extensions.defaultSolutions.description: Options for packages to link to will be populated from, and apply to, these solutions.

Nuget Extensions.defaultProjects.description: Options for packages to link to will be populated from, and apply to, these projects.

Nuget Extensions.defaultShortCircuitPath.description: Using the Watch command will automatically apply short circuiting to these paths. This should be a comma delimited list of valid paths.

scripts.build: yarn clean && yarn lint && yarn compile
